original_text: ‘Yes, tell them to come quickly to sing funeral songs for us. 9: This may be what Jeremiah says. Or it may be what the people say. Then tears will pour from our eyes, and we will not stop weeping. ‘Yes, tell them to come quickly
korean_text: 그들로 빨리 와서 우리를 위하여 애곡하여 우리의 눈에서 눈물이 떨어지게 하며 우리 눈꺼풀에서 물이 쏟아지게 하라

sentences.original_text: Yes, tell them to come quickly
to sing funeral songs for us
9: This may be what Jeremiah says
Or it may be what the people say
Then tears will pour from our eyes
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 우리 눈에서 눈물이 쏟아질 거야

sentences.original_text: and we will not stop weeping
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 우리는 울기를 멈추지 않을 거야

sentences.original_text: Yes, tell them to come quickly
